subtitle.en: Building a vibrant, inclusive, and sustainable community together.

subtitle.or: Hawaasa cimaa, hunda hammatuefi ittifufiinsa qabu waliin ijaaruu.

intro.en: Lideta Subcity Administration is one of the administrative divisions of Addis Ababa City Government. It is responsible for coordinating local governance and supporting public service delivery within its jurisdiction. Operating under the city government framework, the subcity works to ensure accountable administration, effective implementation of municipal policies, and responsive service to the community. The administration is committed to good governance, transparency, and serving the public interest to enhance the well-being of residents.
intro.am: Lideta Subcity Administration is one of the administrative divisions of Addis Ababa City Government. It is responsible for coordinating local governance and supporting public service delivery within its jurisdiction. Operating under the city government framework, the subcity works to ensure accountable administration, effective implementation of municipal policies, and responsive service to the community. The administration is committed to good governance, transparency, and serving the public interest to enhance the well-being of residents.
intro.or: Lideta Subcity Administration is one of the administrative divisions of Addis Ababa City Government. It is responsible for coordinating local governance and supporting public service delivery within its jurisdiction. Operating under the city government framework, the subcity works to ensure accountable administration, effective implementation of municipal policies, and responsive service to the community. The administration is committed to good governance, transparency, and serving the public interest to enhance the well-being of residents.

content.en: Lideta Subcity Administration serves as a local governance body responsible for coordinating administrative functions within its jurisdiction. It facilitates the implementation of city government policies, supports the organization of public services, and ensures effective communication between city institutions and the community. Through its administrative role, the subcity works to promote orderly governance, institutional coordination, and responsiveness to public needs.
content.am: Lideta Subcity Administration serves as a local governance body responsible for coordinating administrative functions within its jurisdiction. It facilitates the implementation of city government policies, supports the organization of public services, and ensures effective communication between city institutions and the community. Through its administrative role, the subcity works to promote orderly governance, institutional coordination, and responsiveness to public needs.
content.or: Lideta Subcity Administration serves as a local governance body responsible for coordinating administrative functions within its jurisdiction. It facilitates the implementation of city government policies, supports the organization of public services, and ensures effective communication between city institutions and the community. Through its administrative role, the subcity works to promote orderly governance, institutional coordination, and responsiveness to public needs.

content.en: Lideta Sub-City is one of the historic and vibrant sub-cities in Addis Ababa. Established with a vision to foster community growth and urban development, Lideta has grown into a hub of commerce, culture, and residential life. Over the years, we have transformed from a traditional neighborhood into a modern urban center while preserving our rich cultural heritage. Our journey is marked by continuous improvement in infrastructure, public services, and community engagement.

content.or: Kutaan Magaalaa Lideta kutaa magaalota seena qabeessaa fi ho'aa Finfinnee keessaa tokko. Guddina hawaasaa fi misooma magaalaa guddisuuf mul'ataan kan hundeeffame, Lideta wiirtuu daldalaa, aadaa fi jireenyaa ta'eera. Waggoota darban keessatti, aadaa keenya isa badhaadhaa osoo eegnuu irraa gara wiirtuu magaalaa ammayyaatti jijjiiramneerra. Imalli keenya fooyya'iinsa itti fufiinsa qabuun bu'uuraalee misoomaa, tajaajila uummataa fi hirmaannaa hawaasaatiin kan beekamudha.

content.en: To provide efficient, transparent, and fair administrative services to residents, fostering social and economic development through community participation.

content.en: To see Lideta Sub-City become a model of good governance, prosperity, and livability in Addis Ababa by 2030.
